author: kzuck
title: A great set!
review:
This set is amazing! Don't let the size fool you, this build is a great set all around. This review is talks about the main, race car model. 

Pros

  • Excellent parts selection w/ 4 headlamps, 2 SNOT 90's, 2 L plates, no big "one use only" parts 
  • A large lot of extra pieces.
  • Great model quality. The detail in such a small model is astounding. 
  • Fun to build, fun to play with
  • Great colors
  • 3 different models to build
  • â€¦

Cons

  • Might not be the best brick/price ratio. I found mine on clearance at the grocery store for $4.95
  • Some people might miss having larger plates or wings 

Definitely worth picking this one up. Especially if you're on a budget, this set will easily satisfy your LEGO cravings.

author: dsaha
title: An Amazing Small Toy
review: This car has very nice detail. I really enjoyed putting it together. I especially liked the sports car version because it is sporty but portable. Very easy to build and great for beginners!
